pitt.search.semanticvectors

Enum TermTermVectorsFromLucene.PositionalMethod

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<TermTermVectorsFromLucene.PositionalMethod>
      • pitt.search.semanticvectors.TermTermVectorsFromLucene.PositionalMethod
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<TermTermVectorsFromLucene.PositionalMethod>
    Enclosing class:
    TermTermVectorsFromLucene

    public static enum TermTermVectorsFromLucene.PositionalMethod
extends java.lang.Enum<TermTermVectorsFromLucene.PositionalMethod>
    Different methods for creating positional indexes.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      BASIC
      Basic "bag-of-words" method using context windows.
      DIRECTIONAL
      Binds vectors on left or right based on position.
      PERMUTATION
      Permutes vectors according to how many places they are from focus term.
      PERMUTATIONPLUSBASIC
      Superposition of basic and permuted vectors.
      PROXIMITY
      Encodes position within sliding window using NumberRepresentation
